data.value: Destroy enemy vehicles: <FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">14</FONT> and more in Standard Battle, Assault and Encounter Battle. <FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">21</FONT> and more in Grand Battle.

data.name: heroesOfRassenay_heroInfo
data.value: In June 1941, near the Lithuanian town of Raseiniai, roughly 20 KV tanks of the Soviet 3rd Mechanized Corps met the assault of the 6th Panzer Division, with approximately 100 vehicles. A single KV tank managed to hold off the German advance for a full day while being pummeled by a variety of antitank weapons, until finally the KV ran out of ammunition and was knocked out.

data.name: huntsman
data.value: Naydin's Medal

data.name: huntsman_condition
data.value: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: huntsman_descr
data.value: Destroy all enemy light tanks (at least 3) in the course of one battle.

data.name: huntsman_heroInfo
data.value: Sergeant Grigoriy Naydin was a BT-7 commander. On June 25th, 1941, near the Lithuanian town of Rudishkyay, he destroyed a Wehrmacht armored column that included 15 vehicles and 10 guns of the 19th Mechanized Corps. Naydin managed to hold off the German advance for two days, making it possible to organize the defenses around Vilnius. For this action, Naydin was made a Hero of the Soviet Union.

data.name: markOfMastery
data.value: Mastery Badge: "%(name)s"

data.name: markOfMasteryContent
data.value:
Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored
vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more
experience in a battle than the average highest
experience of %(val)s players who have fought
in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.

data.name: markOfMasteryContent/1/info
data.value: III Class: 50%

data.name: markOfMasteryContent/2/info
data.value: II Class: 80%

data.name: markOfMasteryContent/3/info
data.value: I Class: 95%

data.name: markOfMasteryContent/4/info
data.value: Ace Tanker: 99%

data.name: markOfMasteryRankHeader
data.value: Mastery Ranks:

data.name: markOfMasterySubContent
data.value:
• The statistics show the maximum rank
of a mastery.
• A newly received current rank is displayed
in the window of the battle results.
• Can be obtained in Random Battles and Ranked Battles.

data.name: marksOnGun/descr/param/label/2

data.name: marksOnGun0
data.value: Marks of Excellence

data.name: marksOnGun0_descr
data.value: To obtain one Mark of Excellence, displayed on the gun, the average damage caused by the player and average damage caused with the player's assistance must be higher than the results of 65% of players in this vehicle for the past 14 days.

data.name: marksOnGun1
data.value: 1 Mark of Excellence

data.name: marksOnGun1_descr
data.value: To obtain two Marks of Excellence, displayed on the gun, the average damage caused by the player and average damage caused with the player's assistance must be higher than the results of 85% of players in this vehicle for the past 14 days.

data.name: marksOnGun2
data.value: 2 Marks of Excellence

data.name: marksOnGun2_descr
data.value: To obtain three Marks of Excellence, displayed on the gun, the average damage caused by the player and average damage caused with the player's assistance must be higher than the results of 95% of players in this vehicle for the past 14 days.

data.name: marksOnGun3
data.value: 3 Marks of Excellence

data.name: marksOnGun3_descr
data.value: The maximum number of Marks of Excellence is obtained.

data.name: marksOnGunHeader
data.value: Ranks by average damage:

data.name: marksOnGun_condition
data.value: • Player's average damage is updated after each battle. Only the 100 recent battles are counted. • Obtained Marks do not disappear even if the player's average damage decreases. • Marks can be obtained in vehicles of Tiers V–X only. • Display of Marks on your vehicles can be disabled in game settings. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalAbrams
data.value: Abrams's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalAbrams_descr
data.value: For the total number of team victories in which the player survived the battle.

data.name: medalAbrams_heroInfo
data.value: General Creighton Abrams commanded U.S. armored forces during WWII and the Vietnam War, earning a reputation as an aggressive and successful commander.

data.name: medalAntiSpgFire
data.value: For Counter-Battery Fire

data.name: medalAntiSpgFire_condition
data.value: • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalAntiSpgFire_descr
data.value: In a battle, destroy all enemy SPGs (at least 2) with an SPG.

data.name: medalBillotte
data.value: Billotte's Medal

data.name: medalBillotte_condition
data.value: • Survive and win the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles count after all damage is received. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalBillotte_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

data.name: medalBillotte_heroInfo
data.value: Pierre Billotte was a captain in the French Army who destroyed 2 Pz.Kpfw. IV, 11 Pz.Kpfw. III and two guns with his Char B1 bis on May 16th, 1940.

data.name: medalBrothersInArms
data.value: Brothers in Arms

data.name: medalBrothersInArms_condition
data.value: • All Platoon members must survive the battle. • All Platoon members receive the award. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalBrothersInArms_descr
data.value: Each Platoon member must destroy at least 3 enemy vehicles.

data.name: medalBrunoPietro
data.value: Bruno's Medal

data.name: medalBrunoPietro_condition
data.value: • Survive and win the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles count after all damage is received. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalBrunoPietro_descr
data.value: Destroy 3-4 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

data.name: medalBrunoPietro_heroInfo
data.value: Pietro Bruno was an Italian tank ace. For exceptional valor in the face of the enemy he was awarded the Gold Medal of Military Valor (Medaglia d'oro al Valore Militare), the highest Italian award.

data.name: medalBurda
data.value: Burda's Medal

data.name: medalBurda_condition
data.value: • Drive a tank or a tank destroyer. • The destroyed vehicle must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalBurda_descr
data.value: Destroy 3 enemy SPGs in one battle.

data.name: medalBurda_heroInfo
data.value: Guards Colonel Alexander Burda was a Soviet tank ace and a Hero of the Soviet Union. On October 4th, 1941, Burda organized an ambush that destroyed an enemy armored column, including ten medium and light tanks, two trucks with antitank guns, and five infantry vehicles.

data.name: medalCarius
data.value: Carius's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalCarius_descr
data.value: For the number of enemy vehicles destroyed.

data.name: medalCarius_heroInfo
data.value: Otto Carius was one of the most successful tank aces of WWII. He commanded the Pz.Kpfw. 38(t), the Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger, and the Jagdtiger tank destroyer during his impressive career.

data.name: medalCoolBlood
data.value: Cold-Blooded

data.name: medalCoolBlood_condition
data.value: • Drive an SPG of at least Tier IV. • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalCoolBlood_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 2 enemy light tanks from a distance of not more than 100 meters.

data.name: medalCrucialContribution
data.value: Crucial Contribution

data.name: medalCrucialContribution_condition
data.value: • All Platoon members receive the award. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalCrucialContribution_descr
data.value: Platoon must destroy at least 12 enemy vehicles.

data.name: medalDeLanglade
data.value: De Langlade's Medal

data.name: medalDeLanglade_condition
data.value: • Enemy vehicles must be within the base circle. • Enemy vehicles may attempt to capture the base all at once or sequentially. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalDeLanglade_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 4 enemy vehicles while they are attempting to capture the base in one battle.

data.name: medalDeLanglade_heroInfo
data.value: Paul Girot de Langlade was a French Army lieutenant-colonel during WWII. In September 1943 he was promoted to colonel. De Langlade fought with the 2nd Tank Division under General Leclerc. On September 12-13, 1944, a combat team under de Langlade's command wiped out Panzerbrigade 112 in the battle of Dompaire, France. Only 4 out of 45 Panthers survived the battle.

data.name: medalDumitru
data.value: Dumitru's Medal

data.name: medalDumitru_condition
data.value: • Drive a tank or a tank destroyer. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalDumitru_descr
data.value: Destroy 3 enemy SPGs in one battle.

data.name: medalDumitru_heroInfo
data.value: Ion S. Dumitru was a Romanian tank ace. He fought in World War II for just twenty-five days, for five on the German side, and, after Romania changed sides, for twenty days against the Germans. On March 26th, 1945, Dumitru contributed to the destruction of six enemy tank destroyers and capture of a battery of 150-mm howitzers.

data.name: medalEkins
data.value: Ekins's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalEkins_descr
data.value: For destroying Tier VIII–X enemy vehicles.

data.name: medalEkins_heroInfo
data.value: Joe Ekins was a tank gunner in the Northamptonshire Division of the British Territorial Army. A number of sources identify Ekins as the individual who brought down famous German tank ace Michael Wittmann.

data.name: medalFadin
data.value: Fadin's Medal

data.name: medalFadin_condition
data.value: • Awarded even if the enemy vehicle is destroyed by a fire caused by the last shell in the ammo. • Awarded for destroying the last enemy vehicle with the last shell using autoloading guns and machineguns. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalFadin_descr
data.value: Destroy the last enemy vehicle in the battle with the last shell in the ammo.

data.name: medalFadin_heroInfo
data.value: A Hero of the Soviet Union, Alexander Fadin was a T-34 commander. Supported by one infantry platoon, Fadin managed to capture the village of Dashukovka (Ukraine) and hold it for five hours with one tank. He destroyed one tank, one SPG, eighteen machinegun nests, and neutralized up to 50 enemy soldiers and officers. His crew also shot down an enemy plane.

data.name: medalGore
data.value: Gore's Medal

data.name: medalGore_condition
data.value: • Damage caused should be at least 2,000 HP • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Hits on allied vehicles are not counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalGore_descr
data.value: Drive an SPG and cause damage exceeding 8 times the hit points of your vehicle.

data.name: medalGore_heroInfo
data.value: British colonel Adrian Clements Gore was in charge of a combat team that defended the Kasserine Pass, Tunisia, on 20 February, 1943. His force, composed of a tank squadron, an infantry company, and a battery of infantry support artillery, put up stiff resistance against troops of the Wehrmacht Africa Korps, comprising five infantry batallions and one tank batallion. The German forces lost 11 tanks in the fighting.

data.name: medalHalonen
data.value: Halonen's Medal

data.name: medalHalonen_condition
data.value: • The targets must be at least two tiers higher than the player's tank destroyer. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalHalonen_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 2 enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a tank destroyer in one battle.

data.name: medalHalonen_heroInfo
data.value: Erkki Halonen, a sergeant in the Finnish Army and a tank ace, destroyed three T-34, two KV-1, and two ISU-152 with his StuG III in battles during June and July 1944.

data.name: medalKay
data.value: Kay's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalKay_descr
data.value: For achieving Battle Hero status.

data.name: medalKay_heroInfo
data.value: Douglas Kay, a British Army sergeant and gunner on a Sherman Firefly, participated in the Allied landing in Normandy and later helped increase popular interest in tank warfare.

data.name: medalKnispel
data.value: Knispel's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalKnispel_descr
data.value: For the total amount of damage caused and received.

data.name: medalKnispel_heroInfo
data.value: Kurt Knispel, a WWII German tank ace, participated in battles on both the Western and Eastern Fronts, fighting in Pz.Kpfw. II, Pz.Kpfw. III, Pz.Kpfw. IV, Pz.Kpfw. VI Tiger, and Pz.Kpfw. VI Ausf. B Tiger II.

data.name: medalKolobanov
data.value: Kolobanov's Medal

data.name: medalKolobanov_condition
data.value: • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalKolobanov_descr
data.value: Stand alone against at least five enemy vehicles and win.

data.name: medalKolobanov_heroInfo
data.value: Colonel Zinoviy Kolobanov was a Soviet tank ace who destroyed 22 German tanks, two guns, and two armored vehicles with his KV-1 in battle on August 19th, 1941.

data.name: medalLafayettePool
data.value: Pool's Medal

data.name: medalLafayettePool_condition
data.value: • In vehicles of at least Tier V. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalLafayettePool_descr
data.value: Destroy enemy vehicles: <FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">10–13</FONT> in Standard Battle, Assault and Encounter Battle. <FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">13–20</FONT> in Grand Battle.

data.name: medalLafayettePool_heroInfo
data.value: Lafayette G. Pool is widely recognized as the U.S. tank ace of aces who destroyed a total of 258 armored vehicles and military vehicles.

data.name: medalLavrinenko
data.value: Lavrinenko's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalLavrinenko_condition
data.value: • Up to 100 points per battle are included.

data.name: medalLavrinenko_descr
data.value: Reduce the total number of capture points of a friendly base.

data.name: medalLavrinenko_heroInfo
data.value: Dmitry Lavrinenko, a Hero of the Soviet Union, Guards Lieutenant, and tank ace, was recognized as the top Soviet tanker, destroying 52 tanks in 28 battles over the course of just two months.

data.name: medalLeClerc
data.value: Leclerc's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalLeClerc_condition
data.value: • Win the battle. • All enemy base capture points earned in one battle are included.

data.name: medalLeClerc_descr
data.value: For the total number of the player's enemy base capture points.

data.name: medalLeClerc_heroInfo
data.value: Philippe Leclerc was a General of the Free French Forces during WWII and one of the leaders of the Paris liberation operation.

data.name: medalLehvaslaiho
data.value: Lehväslaiho's Medal

data.name: medalLehvaslaiho_condition
data.value: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalLehvaslaiho_descr
data.value: Destroy 2 enemy tanks or tank destroyers with a medium tank in one battle.

data.name: medalLehvaslaiho_heroInfo
data.value: Reino Lehväslaiho was a Finnish tank ace who destroyed seven tanks and tank destroyers.

data.name: medalMonolith
data.value: Rock Solid

data.name: medalMonolith_condition
data.value: • SPG's speed must be less than 10 km/h. • The speed of the enemy vehicle that rammed you must exceed the speed of your SPG. • The player must not destroy any allied vehicles. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalMonolith_descr
data.value: While driving an SPG, destroy an enemy vehicle by ramming and survive the battle.

data.name: medalNikolas
data.value: Nicols's Medal

data.name: medalNikolas_condition
data.value: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalNikolas_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 4 enemy tanks or tank destroyers with a medium tank in one battle.

data.name: medalNikolas_heroInfo
data.value: Alfie Nicols was a British tank gunner. During the battle of Al Alamein he destroyed fourteen enemy vehicles.

data.name: medalOrlik
data.value: Orlik's Medal

data.name: medalOrlik_condition
data.value: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalOrlik_descr
data.value: Destroy 2 or more enemy tanks or tank destroyers in a light tank in one battle.

data.name: medalOrlik_heroInfo
data.value: Roman Edmund Orlik, a Polish Army sergeant, was a tank ace who knocked out 13 German tanks with his light TKS tankette in September 1939.

data.name: medalOskin
data.value: Oskin's Medal

data.name: medalOskin_condition
data.value: • The enemy vehicles must be at least 1 tier higher. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalOskin_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 3 enemy tanks or tank destroyers with a medium tank in one battle.

data.name: medalOskin_heroInfo
data.value: Alexander Oskin, a Hero of the Soviet Union, was a tank commander who destroyed three King Tigers with his T-34 during a reconnaissance operation near Oglenduv on August 11th, 1944.

data.name: medalPascucci
data.value: Pascucci's Medal

data.name: medalPascucci_condition
data.value: • Drive a tank or a tank destroyer. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalPascucci_descr
data.value: Destroy 2 enemy SPGs in one battle.

data.name: medalPascucci_heroInfo
data.value: Second Lieutenant Luigi Arbib Pascucci was an Italian tank commander during World War Two. He fought with the Ariete Tank Division in North Africa. Pascucci fought in the Second Battle of El Alamein, where he sacrificed his life in a reckless frontal attack that enabled the rest of his company to escape encirclement.

data.name: medalPoppel
data.value: Popel's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalPoppel_descr
data.value: For the number of enemy vehicles detected.

data.name: medalPoppel_heroInfo
data.value: Lieutenant General of Tank Forces Nikolay Popel, a Soviet military leader and political officer, organized a raid against the enemy rear using captured vehicles during the battle of Dubno (Ukraine) in the summer of 1941.

data.name: medalRadleyWalters
data.value: Radley-Walters's Medal

data.name: medalRadleyWalters_condition
data.value: • In vehicles of at least Tier V. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalRadleyWalters_descr
data.value: Destroy enemy vehicles: <FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">8–9</FONT> in Standard Battle, Assault and Encounter Battle. <FONT COLOR="#FFFFFF">10–12</FONT> in Grand Battle.

data.name: medalRadleyWalters_heroInfo
data.value: Sydney Valpy Radley-Walters was a Canadian tank ace of the 27th Armored Regiment. In 1944–1945 he destroyed 18 German vehicles with his Sherman Firefly.

data.name: medalRotmistrov
data.value: Rotmistrov's Medal %(rank)s

data.name: medalRotmistrov_descr
data.value: For the number of battles fought in Clan Wars.

data.name: medalRotmistrov_heroInfo
data.value: Pavel Rotmistrov, a Hero of the Soviet Union, was a commander of armored units during World War II. Later he became the Chief Marshal of Armored Forces of the Soviet Union.

data.name: medalStark
data.value: Stark's Medal

data.name: medalStark_condition
data.value: • Survive a battle. • Total amount of damage received and damage blocked by armor must be at least 2/3 of the hit points of your vehicle. • Hitting allied vehicles is not counted. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalStark_descr
data.value: While driving an SPG, destroy at least 2 enemy vehicles and receive at least 2 enemy hits that cause damage or are blocked by armor.

data.name: medalStark_heroInfo
data.value: Colonel Alexander Stark commanded the joint French-American task force defending the Kasserine Pass, Tunisia. On 19 February, 1943, Stark's force unleashed heavy artillery fire from the heights surrounding the pass and was able to delay the advancing tank batallion and two infantry batallions of the Wehrmacht Africa Korps, forcing them to request reinforcements.

data.name: medalTamadaYoshio
data.value: Yoshio Tamada's Medal

data.name: medalTamadaYoshio_condition
data.value: • Survive the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles must be one tier higher than the player's tank. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalTamadaYoshio_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 2 enemy SPGs in a light tank in one battle.

data.name: medalTamadaYoshio_heroInfo
data.value: Colonel Yoshio Tamada was the commander-in-chief of the 4th Armored Regiment of the Kwantung Army. During the night battle of Khalkhyn Gol on July 2–3, 1939, he destroyed 4 batteries of 122-mm howitzers, 107-mm guns, 76.2-mm field guns, 10 armored vehicles, 2 armored tracked vehicles, 7 anti-tank guns, 5 mortars, and 20 enemy trucks.

data.name: medalTarczay
data.value: Tarczay's Medal

data.name: medalTarczay_condition
data.value: • Survive and win the battle. • Destroyed enemy vehicles count after all damage is received. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: medalTarczay_descr
data.value: Destroy at least 5 enemy vehicles while having 5 different modules damaged or crew members injured and losing 80% of hit points.

data.name: medalTarczay_heroInfo
data.value: Ervin Tarczay was a Hungarian tank ace. He fought with the Hungarian 2nd Armored Division and destroyed at least ten enemy vehicles.

data.name: medalWittmann
data.value: Bölter's Medal

data.name: medalWittmann_condition
data.value: • The targets had to be enemy vehicles of Tiers IV-X. • Awarded before the release of version 0.8.0.

data.name: medalWittmann_descr
data.value: Destroy 7 or more enemy vehicles with a tank or tank destroyer, or 10 or more vehicles with a self-propelled gun.

data.name: medalWittmann_heroInfo
data.value: Johannes Bölter was one of the most successful German tank aces of WWII. He participated in operations in the invasions of Poland, France, Greece, and the Soviet Union, as well as in the defense of France.

data.name: moonSphere
data.value: Trickshot

data.name: moonSphere_condition
data.value: • Awarded to all members of a victorious team during the special event. • Only one award for all battles fought can be received.

data.name: moonSphere_descr
data.value: Win a battle during the Moon Mayhem special event.

data.name: mousebane
data.value: Mouse Trap

data.name: mousebane_condition
data.value: • Total results in all vehicles are included. • Newly received awards are added together. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Ranked Battles, Tank Company Battles, Advances, and in battles on the Global Map are counted.

data.name: mousebane_descr
data.value: Destroy 10 or more Pz.Kpfw. VIII Maus tanks.

data.name: noMansLand
data.value: Scorched Earth

data.name: noMansLand_condition
data.value: • Awarded to all members of both teams. • Can be obtained in Team Battles only.

data.name: noMansLand_descr
data.value: End a battle in a draw where both teams are completely destroyed.

data.name: operationWinter
data.value: Operation Winter

data.name: operationWinter_condition
data.value: • Awarded to all members of a victorious team during the winter event. • Only one award for all battles fought could be received. • Could only be obtained in Random Battles.

data.name: operationWinter_descr

data.name: promisingFighterMedal

data.name: sinai

data.name: sinai_condition
data.value:
• IS, IS-2, IS-3, IS-3A, IS-4, IS-5, IS-6, IS-7, Kirovets-1, T-10
• ISU-122S, ISU-130, ISU-152
• Object 252U, Defender, Object 260, Object 261, Object 263, Object 268, Object 704
• Only U.S.S.R. vehicles are included. • Series achieved in all vehicles are added together. • Newly received awards are added together. • Vehicles destroyed in Random Battles, Team Battles, Ranked Battles, Advances, and in battles on the Global Map are counted.

data.value: Destroy at least 100 tanks of the IS series and vehicles based on their chassis, including:

data.name: sniper
data.value: Sniper

data.name: sniper2
data.value: Tank Sniper

data.name: sniper2_condition
data.value: • Fire at least 8 shots. • Firing accuracy must be at least 85% per battle. • At least 80% of hits must cause damage, including damage to enemy vehicles and modules. • Damage caused from a distance of more than 300 meters must exceed the hit points of the player's vehicle, at least 1,000 HP. • The player must not hit any allies with direct shots. • Unavailable for SPGs. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only.

data.name: sniper2_descr
data.value: Cause the highest damage in a battle at a distance of at least 300 meters.

data.name: sniper_condition
data.value: • Non-penetrating hits were included. • Direct hits on friendly vehicles were not allowed. • If two or more players had identical hit ratios, the achievement was awarded to the player with the highest number of hits. • If two or more players had identical hit ratios and the same number of hits, the achievement was awarded to the player who had earned more XP for the battle. • The achievement could only be awarded once per battle. • Can be obtained in Random Battles only. • Awarded before the release of 0.8.11 version.

data.name: sniper_descr
data.value: Achieve at least 85% hits out of a minimum of 10 shots fired with potential damage of 1,000 HP or more.
